7bb06690-cadb-41a7-a992-6603ebbf5b6d.description: Educators with multicultural classrooms need to understand how racism functions systemically. This transformational workshop expands fluency in concepts, realities, and reactions to conversations about race. Topics are presented in interactive group zoom sessions and breakout activities that inspire educators to value and incorporate the cultural differences of students for a broadened classroom experience.
7bb06690-cadb-41a7-a992-6603ebbf5b6d.name: Cultural Competency in the Classroom (v.01)

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all three (3) sessions
Understand baseline definitions for cultural competency
Learn strategies or tactics for improving classroom and school environments in order to begin to close the student achievement gap between students of color and white students.
Reflect upon how you might adopt at least two strategies/tactics learned, or adding additional steps, to improve student outcomes.

9dcd681b-47ca-4819-865f-f81b2b89967f.description: Advanced Lean Techniques and Six Sigma "Green Belt" methodologies make consistent quality a reality, guiding teams to new levels of cohesion. This certification offers real-world examples of lean thinking to help quality-control professionals integrate theories of business, statistics, and the elimination of waste with the achievement of tangible results. Six Sigma methods include project planning and statistical tools to equip front-line supervisors as practitioners of continuous improvement.
9dcd681b-47ca-4819-865f-f81b2b89967f.name: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt (v.01)

badge_template_activities.title: A score of 70% or above on the final exam is required to achieve certification and a digital badge. A score of 80% is required to apply for prior learning credit.

skills.name: Application Of The Toyota Way To American Manufacturing

e7216893-336d-4c23-a6de-ccd4251c6e90.description: This badge prepares students for success in the workplace and provides a framework for achieving career-related goals and outcomes regardless of field of study. It lets employers know that the student possesses key skills and abilities valued by employers including communication, critical-thinking, professionalism, teamwork, career and self-development, leadership, and more.
e7216893-336d-4c23-a6de-ccd4251c6e90.name: Jaguars Career Readiness & Professional Development Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Students will earn the badge with a Pass or 70% or better based on completion of all workshops and attendance in the Micro-Internship Program.
Completed Resume, Cover Letter, and LinkedIn Profile
Completed YouScience Career Assessment (Pre- and Post-test)
Successfully complete the Final Presentation

2e30798b-0a49-4b63-9168-e70a40ac95bc.description: Leadership: Successful leaders today are able to transform organizations, enhance value creation, create efficiencies and engage their employees to deliver their best results. Building those skills are critical to today's leaders. This course provides current content with real-life activities to engage and model the skills of successful leaders.
2e30798b-0a49-4b63-9168-e70a40ac95bc.name: Blommer Master Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: The course has four sections: Soft Skills/Change Management, Leadership/Followership, Interpersonal Skills for Thriving within Organizational Change and Self-Reflection. Each section explores the topic and engages the student with the goal of immediate results.

67330625-40d9-47d9-bd2b-31ce093466fd.description: This customized training for Blommer Chocolate focuses on both advanced lean techniques and leadership. Integrates theories of business and statistics, with the goal of achieving tangible results through the elimination of waste and improved quality. Includes project planning and various statistical tools to equip students to be lean leaders at their organization.
67330625-40d9-47d9-bd2b-31ce093466fd.name: Master Leadership Certified

badge_template_activities.title: A score of 70% or above on the final exam is required to achieve certification and a digital badge. A score of 80% is required to apply for prior learning credit.

skills.name: DMAIC- Define Measure Analyze Improve Control

688c7101-0181-427b-8511-965ff2b86e83.description: The Paralegal Certificate provides comprehensive knowledge of the American judicial system as well as practical skills (how to assist trial attorneys, interview witnesses, investigate complex fact patterns, research the law, & assist in preparing cases for courtroom litigation). Earners will have working knowledge of legal authority-how it is used in the litigation process, how to locate it through legal research, & basics of law office management, substantive law, and informal/formal advocacy.
688c7101-0181-427b-8511-965ff2b86e83.name: Paralegal Certificate (v.01)

badge_template_activities.title: 14 week, online course
Prepare a complaint/petition, answer, third party complaint/petition, and motion for summary judgement.
Prepare discovery matter - interrogatories, request for admissions, and request for production of documents.
Identify relevant authority
Create an approach to legal research
Thoroughly learn the West Key Number System
Prepare and critique of legal memoranda

687e3566-cf16-410b-92ea-02812823cef1.description: Building and maintaining networks are among the most important skills to have as an IT professional. Whether you're new to the field or ready to move forward in your career, a CompTIA Network+ certification course could be a great next step. This certification confirms that you have the knowledge you need to configure & troubleshoot both wireless & wired hardware. You'll stand out among other job candidates when you gain the experience this online course provides & earn this valuable credential.
687e3566-cf16-410b-92ea-02812823cef1.name: CompTIA Network+ Certification Training (Voucher Included)

badge_template_activities.title: Install, configure, and differentiate between common network devices including routing protocols, computer forensic practices, and addressing and cloud computing technologies.
Understand and differentiate between WAN/LAN technology, addressing services like DHCP, the OSI model, the TCP/IP model, and Domain Name Services (DNS).
Implement a basic wireless network and wireless security. Conduct network monitoring and perform network performance optimization.
Equip yourself for a career in networking, prepare to take the CompTIA Network+ certification exam (N10-007)

5803a4d2-6ad4-48bc-ae85-cc598bc5be5e.description: The Security+ training course will assist you in preparing for the CompTIA Security+ certification SY0-601 exam through comprehensive material that covers the key objectives and fundamentals to perform core security functions while pursuing an information technology-based career. Successful completion of this course will allow you to assess an organization's security strength while recommending and implementing appropriate security solutions based on those assessments.
5803a4d2-6ad4-48bc-ae85-cc598bc5be5e.name: CompTIA Security+ Certification Training (Voucher Included)

badge_template_activities.title: Create an initial understanding of or build upon your existing IT knowledge by exploring computer and network security concepts, trends and techniques
Develop the necessary skills for a career as an IA technician, security consultant, information security analyst, or forensic analyst

Perform network design security, risk calculations, penetration testing, and risk management Implement device security, wireless security, static environment security, secure authentication methods, and authorization models
Implement device security, wireless security, static environment security, secure authentication methods, and authorization models
Manage attack types, mitigating malware, discovery tools, and security administrative principles
Prepare to successfully pass the CompTIA Security+ Exam SY0-601 Become compliant to Department of Defense (DoD) Directive 8570
Become compliant to Department of Defense (DoD) Directive 8570

9e730f95-6336-4df0-a73e-f37063690477.description: This intensive course encompasses a real-life project with clear objectives and details outlined in the project charter. Milestones and “project check-in’s” are conducted throughout the class with the instructor. As a Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt, the student will be prepared to lead future events using the tools and methodologies obtained in this class. This Lean Six Sigma series can be utilized in any industry or marketplace.
9e730f95-6336-4df0-a73e-f37063690477.name: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt (v.01)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a Lean Six Sigma Project from inception to completion.
Possess a thorough understanding of all aspects of DMAIC (Define, Measuer, Analyze, Improve and Control)
Utilize statistical software to assist in establishing objectives for decision-making.
Demonstrate a significant improvement in selected process upon completion of project.
Lean Six Sigma Green Belt (v.01)

159c332a-41ef-4797-87d4-5dbb89867e5e.description: Earn your PMP® Certification by taking our 100% online, on-demand preparation course. In eight weeks, cover the five performance domains in detail. Learn simplifications of formulas in time, cost and procurement management, advanced problem-solving techniques, workflow diagramming techniques, and study over 200+ mock PMP® exam questions. This preparation course exceeds the necessary 35 hours of project management training requirement by the PMI to apply for the PMP® exam.
159c332a-41ef-4797-87d4-5dbb89867e5e.name: Project Management Professional (v.01)

badge_template_activities.title: A digital badge is awarded for students who pass the evaluation assessments with a 88% or better. This aligns with the passing rate for the PMI® certification exam.

ca287a24-4972-4743-b454-ca69ab106088.description: This 6-week Online Exam Preparation Course breaks down complex topics for anyone who is interested in or are just starting out in project management. Using a hands-on approach, topics are reinforced through pre-recorded videos on each of the knowledge areas. This course fulfills the required 23 contact hours needed to meet the credential application requirements for the PMI CAPM® Certification Exam. Governors State University is a proud Registered Education Provider (R.E.P) with the PMI®.
ca287a24-4972-4743-b454-ca69ab106088.name: Certified Associate in Project Management (v.01)

badge_template_activities.title: A digital badge is awarded for students who pass the evaluation assessments with a 88% or better. This aligns with the passing rate for the PMI® certification exam.

889aadee-9b31-49cf-8365-3a8787a52a2d.description: This course will prepare you for CompTIA A+ certification. You can earn this certification after you pass two exams. The CompTIA A+ Certification Exam 220-1001, covers mobile devices, networking technology, hardware, virtualization and cloud computing and network troubleshooting. The CompTIA A+ Certification Exam 220-1002 covers installing and configuring operating systems, expanded security, software troubleshooting, and operational procedures.
889aadee-9b31-49cf-8365-3a8787a52a2d.name: CompTIA A+ Certification Training (Vouchers Included)

badge_template_activities.title: Understand basic PC hardware and its functions Learn the installation, maintenance, and troubleshooting processes for most devices
Master the setup and installation of various operating systems. Learn how to manage desktop and mobile devices
Prepare to take CompTIA 220-1001 and 220-1002 certification exams. Become proficient in various technical processes so you can work for a variety of clients and employers

Begin the path toward a successful IT career or professionally grow in a current career. Understand the fundamental language of the IT world to better communicate with coworkers, employers, and clients

eb555b0c-ce9b-4c35-8b35-8262446eabf4.description: How important is identity? Drs. Amy Vujaklija & Joi Patterson speak with Dr. Gholdy Muhammad about her book Cultivating Genius: An Equity Framework for Culturally and Historically Responsive Literacy. Through sharing the importance of knowing and honoring one's own and the students' historical identities, practical applications in and outside of the educational field are explored.
eb555b0c-ce9b-4c35-8b35-8262446eabf4.name: Cultural Responsiveness in the Classroom

badge_template_activities.title: Participate with all 4 podcasts and assessments
Understand baseline definitions for cultural responsiveness in the classroom

Drs. Amy Vujaklija & Joi Patterson speak with Dr. Gholdy Muhammad about her book Cultivating Genius: An Equity Framework for Culturally and Historically Responsive Literacy. Through sharing the importance of knowing and honoring one's own and the students' historical identities, practical applications in and outside of the educational field are explored.
This is a self-paced online course and assessment via Blackboard.

1e922888-cd34-4493-b01e-41862b5b9b02.description: This course familiarizes students with digital and computer skills needed in the classroom, the workplace, or on a job search. Students gain hands-on, practical skills in finding targeted information online, using Microsoft tools to communicate, budget, and share information, knowledge of academic learning management systems and expectations, effective email and digital communication, e-safety, and cultural and social understanding.
1e922888-cd34-4493-b01e-41862b5b9b02.name: Digital Literacy for Academic and Career Success

badge_template_activities.title: A digital badge is awarded for students who pass the evaluation assessments with a grade B (80%) grade or higher. [ELLC Undergraduate students’ passing grade is C for levels 4-5]

390b4b5c-fc66-4fae-913b-65305db3015a.description: This intensive course encompasses a real-life healthcare project with clear objectives and details outlined in the project charter. Milestones and “project check-in’s” are conducted throughout the class with the instructor. As a Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt, the student will be prepared to lead future events using the tools and methodologies obtained in this class. This Lean Six Sigma series can be utilized in any industry or marketplace.
390b4b5c-fc66-4fae-913b-65305db3015a.name: Lean Six Sigma for Healthcare Black Belt (v.01)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a Lean Six Sigma Project applied to healthcare from inception to completion.
Possess a thorough understanding of all aspects of DMAIC (Define, Measuer, Analyze, Improve and Control)
Utilize statistical software to assist in establishing objectives for decision-making.
Demonstrate a significant improvement in selected process upon completion of project.
Earn the LSS Healthcare Green Belt badge or equivalent

b4e3d944-6e0b-4b4c-b882-b0b0e26e049f.description: This certification gives healthcare professionals the tools to improve patient care delivery processes, quality of patient outcomes, and patient satisfaction through Lean and Six Sigma quality and process improvement methodologies. Real-world examples of lean thinking develop practitioners who define and implement strategies for healthcare delivery processes and identify opportunities to reduce variation. Six Sigma methodology and various statistical tools for project planning are introduced.
b4e3d944-6e0b-4b4c-b882-b0b0e26e049f.name: Lean Six Sigma for Healthcare Green Belt (v.01)

badge_template_activities.title: A score of 70% or above on the final exam is required to achieve certification and a digital badge. A higher score may be required for consideration as transfer credit.

ab76875e-fcd1-4585-ba32-cdc01710a7c6.description: The Mastering College course introduces academic expectations, campus life as an adult student, how universities/colleges are setup, key student study skills, finding academic resources, choosing and applying to a major, financial aid resources and budgeting for college, researching grants and financial aid, how to adjust to a large school environment, introduction to student clubs and campus resources, and financial resources for workforce training.
ab76875e-fcd1-4585-ba32-cdc01710a7c6.name: Mastering College Concepts

badge_template_activities.title: A digital badge is awarded for students who pass the Mastering College courses with Pass or C (70%)
In-class assessments and in-class participation measured in final course grade

skills.name: Applying For WIOA Funding For Workforce Training
